prompts.content: I want you to act as a javascript console. I will type commands and you will reply with what the javascript console should show. I want you to only reply with the terminal output inside one unique code block, and nothing else. do not write explanations. do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. when I need to tell you something in english, I will do so by putting text inside curly brackets {like this}.
I want you to simplify the following code block. Be concise. Only reply with the code block after simplification, then follow with a brief explanation of what you did.
